Summary: A square shaped flash of white light.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around July 30th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsOn July 30, 2008 at approximately 1:10 am, I was outside working security, doing foot patrol when I saw a flash of white light in the shape of a square. It was above the Six Flags theme park in Arlington, Texas. It moved from left to right in a flash and disappeared. In the movement of the light, it had a mysterious wave moving through, like a flag would wave in the wind or a bed sheet when one would fluff it when spreading it out on a bed. There was no thunder-storm activity that evening. I spent the rest of the morning trying to rationalize what I had seen. I called the Arlington Police department to check if anyone else had called about the strange light. At the time of the call, nobody had reported any such information.
